/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, divided by a white fence, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. These structures, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. Cars and pedestrians animate the street, adding life to the cityscape. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's architectural style and the vibrancy of its streets.
